messages.message: this is on prod too?? @Paul H can you help look into this?
i can reproduce this in my Build project on prod :disappointed:

@Vishwa i see that you were able to unblock yourself in your Build project though

@Kaustubh (KD) how do we want to prioritize this bug? seems pretty frustrating to have this happen for this core feature :disappointed:
Yeah is this an easy fix?

i did some digging, and i think i've figured out what's going wrong

https://instabase.zoom.us/clips/share/IO-dSPs4RhGhulhMCER6Qw
Passcode: Z#GN=4&J

hopefully this will give you a good start in the bug fix! @Paul H

• new `PUT /extracted_fields` API call indicates that we fished extraction for a field and are saving those field value(s)
• we then create a new `args` object in fromUdfApi (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/a367f26753e690ffb9d85cf8caeac956551b0705/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/api/udf.utils.ts#L69-L79), using these field values
solution
• somehow memoize `args` based on the `field_id`, `name`, `label` in each arg
    ◦ so that changing field values don't change the selection state

Yes, @Serena. I was able to unblock myself and continue progressing with my Build project workflow.
Additionally, I would like to explore the option of hiding fields in AI Hub that serve as intermediate steps and are used exclusively as inputs for derived fields.
